name: Wars of Napoleon
description: AGEod goes back to the Napoleonic era and delivers the most detailed and comprehensive strategy game ever created about a time of struggle and conquest that forged modern Europe.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Pentium 4 or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1024Mb video card Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1810 MB available space Additional Notes: Screen: 1024 x 768 or higher

reviews.review_text: Just registered my steam key for Wars of Napoleon, but have been playing it since it came out in december 2015. Great game, cannot recommend it enough, due to its depth, scope, GUI, graphics.  The CTDs mentioned by others can be ameliorated by changing game settings at startup, doing regular saves, getting the latest patch - visit the AGEOD forum for the game, where there are lots of tips on this. It's a resource intensive game, so minimize that where possible, for instance not loading all the map at startup.  The game is absolutely playable - I have many hours with it, before I got it registered on Steam It has a learning curve. I note most of the 'no' recommendations on Steam are from people who have played the game just fractions of an hour, or so. Give the game some time. Do the tutorials.  This is the ultimate Napoleonic era game, and if you'll invest some time in it, you won't regret it.

An absolutely awesome addition to the AGEOD's catalogue. Fight as Napoleon, or his rivals in a majestic battle for control of Europe! Ageods games have more information/tooltips than any historical game I know of. Highly recommended 9/10. Here is some gameplay to give you an idea of what to expect.
